title: You're On Your Own, Kid
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:00.37] Summer went away
[00:02.40] Still, the yearning stays
[00:04.49] I play it cool with the best of them
[00:08.57] I wait patiently
[00:10.29] He's gonna notice me
[00:12.98] It's okay, we're the best of friends
[00:17.93] Anyway
[00:20.42] I hear it in your voice
[00:22.17] You're smoking with your boys
[00:24.57] I touch my phone as if it's your face
[00:28.25] I didn't choose this town
[00:30.36] I dream of getting out
[00:32.71] There's just one who could make me stay
[00:37.97] All my days
[00:40.69] From sprinkler splashes to fireplace ashes
[00:44.57] I waited ages to see you there
[00:48.66] I search the party of better bodies
[00:52.73] Just to learn that you never cared
[00:57.35] You're on your own, kid
[00:58.90] You always have been
[01:01.72] 
[01:04.18] I see the great escape
[01:06.34] So long, Daisy May
[01:08.59] I picked the petals, he loves me not
[01:12.44] Something different bloomed
[01:14.59] Writing in my room
[01:16.61] I play my songs in the parking lot
[01:21.76] I'll run away
[01:24.45] From sprinkler splashes to fireplace ashes
[01:28.46] I called a taxi to take me there
[01:32.52] I search the party of better bodies
[01:36.65] Just to learn that my dreams aren't rare
[01:41.34] You're on your own, kid
[01:42.92] You always have been
[01:45.67] 
[02:04.35] From sprinkler splashes to fireplace ashes
[02:08.40] I gave my blood, sweat, and tears for this
[02:12.51] I hosted parties and starved my body
[02:16.62] Like I'd be saved by a perfect kiss
[02:20.43] The jokes weren't funny, I took the money
[02:24.63] My friends from home don't know what to say
[02:28.59] I looked around in a blood-soaked gown
[02:32.48] And I saw something they can't take away
[02:36.38] 'Cause there were pages turned with the bridges burned
[02:40.46] Everything you lose is a step you take
[02:44.21] So make the friendship bracelets
[02:46.53] Take the moment and taste it
[02:48.55] You've got no reason to be afraid
[02:53.27] You're on your own, kid
[02:57.49] Yeah, you can face this
[03:01.48] You're on your own, kid
[03:02.81] You always have been
[03:04.17]
